DOC.brief_summary: Study Objectives . Despite effective cognitive behavioral treatment chronic insomnia , treatment underutilized . This study evaluate impact 6-week , online treatment insomnia . Design This randomize control trial online treatment wait list control condition . Participants Participants adult Manitoba Canada chronic insomnia . Setting Participants receive online treatment home . Intervention . Online treatment consist psychoeducation , sleep hygiene stimulus control instruction , sleep restriction treatment , mindfulness training , relaxation training , cognitive therapy , help medication taper . Measurement Results . The impact online treatment primary end point sleep quality , insomnia severity , daytime fatigue assess .
DOC.criteria: Access high speed internet , insomnia duration > 6 month occur least 4 night per week , sleeponset latency > 30 minute and/or time awake night > 30 minute , and/or early morning awaken > 30 minute desire time , least one type daytime impairment . Shift work , acute suicidality , mania , schizophrenia , head injury , alcohol intake > 14 drinks/week male , > 12 drink per week female , current past behavioral treatment insomnia
